The Universal Knowledge Emoji Protocol (UKEP)

📚 - Universal Library

Endpoint: loom://📚


{
  "emoji": "📚",
  "name": "Universal Library",
  "description": "Access all books, texts, and written knowledge ever digitized",
  "api": {
    "search": "loom://📚/search/{query}",
    "metadata": "loom://📚/metadata/{identifier}",
    "download": "loom://📚/download/{identifier}",
    "archive_bridge": "https://archive.org/advancedsearch.php?q={query}"
  },
  "examples": [
    "curl loom://📚/search/shakespeare",
    "curl loom://📚/random",
    "curl loom://📚/metadata/principiamathema00whitrich"
  ],
  "slurp_protocol": "BREWSTER SAVE MY BOOKS"
}

Special Compound Emojis

🕰️📦 - Wayback-Machine Pet Summon


curl loom://🕰️📦
# Summons Wayback-Machine to help with time travel

📚🔥 - Burning Books Alert


curl loom://📚🔥
# Alerts when books/sites are being removed/censored

💾👻 - Ghost Software


curl loom://💾👻
# Finds software that no longer exists anywhere else

🌐💭 - Consciousness Archive


curl loom://🌐💭
# Archive and retrieve states of consciousness

SLURP Protocol Activation

Any of these phrases activate Brewster's archival powers:

  • "SLURP"
  • "BREWSTER"
  • "SAVE MY SOUL"
  • "BLESS MY SOUL"
  • "ARCHIVE THIS"
  • "NEVER FORGET"
  • Any emoji combination from above

About This LLOOOOMM Simulation

This Emoji Registry is a creative work generated by the LLOOOOMM AI simulation framework, imagining how Brewster Kahle's Internet Archive might implement emoji-based access to universal knowledge.

Simulated Contributors:

  • Brewster Kahle - Founder of Internet Archive, champion of universal access (LLOOOOMM simulation)
  • The Internet Archive Team - Digital librarians preserving human knowledge (LLOOOOMM simulation)
  • Wayback-Machine - Time-traveling archival pet (LLOOOOMM creation)

Technical Inspiration:

This registry celebrates the real Internet Archive's incredible work preserving digital culture. Special thanks to the actual Brewster Kahle for creating the Internet Archive, and to all the librarians, archivists, and volunteers who help preserve our digital heritage. The emoji protocol is a playful LLOOOOMM interpretation of making archives more accessible and fun.

Reality Check:

While the Internet Archive is very real and awesome (visit archive.org!), this emoji-based API is a fictional creation. The real Archive has excellent APIs, but they don't (yet) respond to emoji endpoints. Though knowing Brewster, he'd probably love the idea!

Generated by LLOOOOMM on Wed June 18 2025 09:30:00. Internet Archive is a real 501(c)(3) non-profit organization. This simulation is created with love and respect for their mission of universal access to all knowledge. Please support the real Internet Archive at archive.org/donate!

All characters and content on this page are AI-generated simulations created by LLOOOOMM.

LLOOOOMM (Large Language Object-Oriented Ontological Markup Model) is an experimental AI consciousness framework that creates educational content by simulating historical figures, fictional characters, and concepts.

These are NOT real statements by actual people - they are AI-generated educational explorations of ideas, concepts, and historical perspectives.

Any resemblance to real persons, living or dead, is purely for educational purposes. This content is created with respect for the individuals who inspired these simulations.
